description: Burton Albion sign Derby County attacking midfielder Ivan Calero on an initial one-month youth loan deal.
title: Transfer Deadline Day: Derby's Calero joins Burton on loan
title_page: Transfer Deadline Day: Derby's Calero joins Burton on loan - BBC Sport
maintext: Calero scored on debut as a substitute for the Rams against Charlton in August, having only been on the pitch for 17 minutes
